name: Block Basher
description:
GMAP 231 Assignment 04

Objective:

Break all the bricks to go to the next level!

How to Play:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move paddle
  • Spacebar to launch ball
  • Green power-ups will grant 1 extra life
  • Red enemies will cause temporary loss of paddle control

Certain assets were imported into this project through the Unity Asset Store.
